availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James H. Roberts Jr. (Caldwell co., ky, farmer )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Caldwell County, Kentucky, native. Son of James H. Roberts and Regina Roberts. Married to Chloe Jane Jones Roberts in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in November 1853. Father of Mary W. Roberts, Johnnie W. Roberts, and Willie A. Roberts. Laborer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Princeton in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in Princeton in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 284A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 95.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 226A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Williams Mill, p. 544A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000546372, p. 112.
